column2: - Plan, design, implement and operate the IT, MIS and KM platform for the program, built from intensive engagement with the national mission officials and other stakeholders focusing on their strategic planning, monitoring and supervision priorities.      - Update the existing system requirement study (SRS) of the Mission s MIS. The updated SRS must be in alignment with the objectives and operational plans of the Mission s next phase.      - Prepare digital architecture for the digitization of SHG/ Area Level Federation (ALF)/ City Level Federation (CLF) operations including regular meetings, amendments to SHG membership and other day-to-day activities.      - Prepare digital architecture for the digitization of their financial records including savings, internal and external lending, repayments and other financial transactions.      - Prepare digital architecture for the development of a social entitlement eligibility engine based on the socio-economic profile of the beneficiaries.      - Support the Mission in developing procurement documents, supporting the evaluation of proposals and selecting competent IT firms for the development of SHG operations and finances digitization tool(s) and the eligibility engine tool.      - Generate the Missions relevant periodic reports through its MIS for monitoring and for generating discussion and debates among policymakers.      - Provide remote assistance to the state and city-level MIS specialists as and when required.      - Assess capacity gaps of state/ city officials and SHGs and CBOs, and collaborate with the capacity building teammates to develop training resources related to the MIS and other digital tools to be developed under the Mission.      - Coordinate component-specific inputs and expertise from the client, donors, UMC head office and partners in a collaborative fashion.      - Develop user manuals targeting the officials, SHGs/ ALFs/ CLFs and field organisations for KM, MIS and IT tools.        Qualifications and skills:        - An advanced degree in IT, computer science or electronics or MCA/ PGDCA      - Computer proficiency, especially related to database management      - Minimum 5 years of experience in government/ semi-government/ autonomous organizations/ private companies of repute.      - Exposure to software development and project management, database management, MIS      - Strong experience and track record of training government officials, private sector and field organizations in IT/ MIS/ database management      - Experience in developing user manuals for digital/ IT tools.      - Minimum of 2 years working experience in a ministry of the national government, or a department of a state government will be an added advantage      - Maturity and confidence to deal with the staff of government institutions and communities.      - Displays sensitivity and inclusiveness for all cultures, genders, religions, races, nationalities      - Excellent coordination skills and result-oriented collaboration with colleagues      - Excellent communication (both oral and written) in English and Hindi. Knowledge of additional languages would be an asset.

column2: Develop and maintain interactive dashboards, reports, and visualizations using Power BI to provide insights into key business metrics and KPIs.            Design and implement data models and ETL processes to transform raw data into meaningful and actionable insights.            Utilize VBA (Visual Basic for Applications) to automate manual processes, improve workflow efficiency, and enhance data manipulation capabilities in Microsoft Excel and other applications.            Leverage Python for data analysis, scripting, and automation tasks, including data cleaning, manipulation, and statistical analysis.            Implement Robotic Process Automation (RPA) solutions to automate repetitive tasks and streamline business processes, using tools such as UiPath, Automation Anywhere, or Blue Prism.            Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements, gather data sources, and deliver analytical solutions that meet stakeholders needs.            Conduct exploratory data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies in the data, and communicate findings to stakeholders through clear and compelling visualizations.            Stay current with emerging trends and best practices in data analytics, visualization, and automation technologies, and propose innovative solutions to address business challenges.            Provide training and support to end-users on how to effectively use data tools and dashboards to make data-driven decisions and optimize business performance.            Participate in continuous improvement initiatives to enhance data governance, data quality, and data-driven decision-making processes within the organization              Requirements          Bachelors degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Information Systems, or a related field; Masters degree preferred.            Proven experience as a Data Analyst or Business Intelligence Analyst, with a minimum of 8 to 10+ years of experience in developing and implementing data solutions.            Strong proficiency in Power BI, including experience with data modelling, DAX calculations, and building interactive reports and dashboards.            Proficiency in VBA (Visual Basic for Applications) for automation tasks and advanced data manipulation in Microsoft Excel.            Experience with Python for data analysis, scripting, and automation, with knowledge of libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib.            Hands-on experience with Robotic Process Automation (RPA) tools and technologies, such as UiPath, Automation Anywhere, or Blue Prism.            Solid understanding of data management principles, ETL processes, and database technologies (SQL, MySQL, etc.).            Working knowledge on Power Apps, Power Automate, SharePoint, OneDrive and data analytics tools            Strong analytical skills and problem-solving abilities, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.            Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams and communicate technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.            Proactive attitude, self-motivated, and able to work independently with minimal supervision

column2: Role & responsibilities    Job Description:  Position Overview: We are seeking a highly skilled and motivated MIS Specialist to join our dynamic team.  The MIS Specialist will play a crucial role in managing and optimizing our organization's information systems to  ensure effective decision-making and streamlined business processes. The ideal candidate will possess a  strong technical background, excellent problem-solving skills, and a deep understanding of information  management principles. Responsibilities:  1. System Administration: ??Manage and administer the organization's Management Information Systems, ensuring optimal  performance, security, and reliability. ??Oversee the installation, configuration, and maintenance of hardware and software components  related to MIS.  2. Data Management: ??Develop and implement data management policies and procedures to ensure data accuracy,  integrity, and accessibility. ??Collaborate with relevant departments to establish data quality standards and monitor  adherence.  3. Reporting and Analysis: ??Generate and present regular and ad-hoc reports to support decision-making processes. ??Conduct data analysis to identify trends, patterns, and areas for improvement.  4. User Support and Training: ??Provide technical support to end-users, troubleshooting issues related to MIS. ??Develop and deliver training programs to enhance the user proficiency of MIS tools and  systems.  5. Security and Compliance: ??Implement and enforce security measures to protect sensitive information and ensure  compliance with data protection regulations. ??Conduct regular audits to assess system vulnerabilities and address security concerns.  6. Collaboration: ??Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and translate  them into MIS solutions. ??Work closely with IT and other relevant departments to integrate MIS with other systems.  7. Technology Evaluation: ??Stay updated on emerging technologies and industry best practices in MIS. ??Evaluate new technologies and make recommendations for system enhancements or  replacements.  Preferred candidate profile   Qualifications: ??Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, or a related field.  ??Proven experience working with MIS or similar systems.  ??Strong knowledge of database management, data warehousing, and business intelligence concepts.  ??Proficiency in programming languages (e.g., SQL, Python) and data visualization tools will be add on.  ??Excellent problem-solving and analytical skills.  ??Effective communication and interpersonal abilities ??Familiarity with relevant data protection and privacy regulations  Immediate joiners preferred. Interested candidates share your profile to careers@supremefacility.com

column2: The Cluster Lead will be responsible for building and managing a profitable business from the ground up. This role includes hiring and leading a team of Senior Creator Business Managers and Business Managers, driving business revenue growth, ensuring creator retention and growth, and managing cross-functional coordination and stakeholder relationships. column2: AM DM Mgr. - IT Tableau :  About CMR: CMR Green Technologies Limited   formerly known as Century Metal Recycling Limited is Indias largest producer of Aluminum and Zinc die-casting alloys with a combined annual capacity of over approx. 4, 18, 000 MT per annum. Since its inception in 2006, it has maintained its fast-paced growth by leveraging the latest technology and continuous improvement. CMR, which recycles aluminum scrap to make alloy, has 28-30 percent market share in India and is nearly three times larger than its nearest competitor. We are having strong presence at PAN India level (North, West & South) with 13 manufacturing units, 5000 strong workforce and supplies to major automotive industry in India including tier one OEMs like Maruti Suzuki, Honda Cars, Bajaj Auto, Hero MotoCorp, and Royal Enfield Motors.  Position:   Area Head - Visual Application Development (Tableau)  Job Band/ Designation:   B/ Asst. Manager/ Deputy Manager/ Manager  No. of Posts :   01  Department :   Information Technology  Reporting to:   DGM IT       Qualifications:   Essential:   Degree/ Diploma in IT from Recognized institution  Desired:   MCA/ ME/ M.Sc. Computer Sciences.  Experience:   Extensive experience in developing, maintaining and managing Tableau driven dashboards & analytics and working knowledge of Tableau administration/architecture.  Job Profile:   The role holder will be responsible for development using Tableau and SQL , creating technical solutions, creating data storage tools, and conducting tests.  Primary Responsibilities:     Strong Hands-on Tableau development   Knowledge of SQL server.   Should be able to write queries and views.   Troubleshooting skills required for support activities in Tableau + SQL.   ERP functional flow be an added advantage.   Able to understand different stake holders requirement and deliver reports.  Required Competencies:     Aptitude for using Computers   Strong written and verbal communication   Proficiency in reporting analysis tools       Required Knowledge:     Relevant work Experience   A solid understanding of SQL, rational databases, and normalization   Proficiency in use of query and reporting analysis tools.   Competency in Excel (macros, pivot tables, etc.)  General:   Age 30-35 Years   Candidate should not be a frequent job changer.   Notice Period: Joining period Max 30 Days. We can buy notice period, if required.  Location:   The corporate office is located near to Badarpur Border, beside Sarai Metro Station L & T Business Park, Tower B, 7th Floor
